root: ^Note to diver: Hello there, employee #149048! Thank you again for your cooperation. Our last diver was unfortunately not up to the task of this job, hence why he was lost at sea, so you've been sent in his place!
^The company marked a particularly interesting fish, and we want you to finish the job of collecting it. The previous diver's notes should already be on board for your reference. Good luck!

^DAY 1 LOG - A plethora of ocean creatures are visible through the submarine's massive window. Looking out, I find myself at ease. Clownfish, Squid, Tuna - the creatures of the ocean are so beautiful! How could anyone bring themselves to hate - even fear - such lovely creatures?
